title: A year of no dashboards
content:
I removed most dashboards and replaced them with daily text summaries. The summaries highlight only deltas: signups, errors, deploys, and cash. No charts to babysit, just the facts.

This change reduced the urge to chase noise. When something important moves, it shows up in the text and I act. Otherwise, I keep building.

Less screen time on dashboards freed hours each week for actual work, and the codebase is healthier because I am not optimizing for vanity metrics.
